means: （牛奶中的油脂粒）均匀分布的，均质的
使类同( homogenize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The two liquids homogenized in the blender.
sentence.Network_cn: 两种液体在掺和器里均匀了一下。

sentence.Network_en: Portions of this homogenized sample are taken for the various analyses desired.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们取出一部分均匀化的样品进行所要求的各项分析.

sentence.Network_en: The dried sample is crushed and homogenized, and stored in a jar.
sentence.Network_cn: 把干燥的样品粉碎,均化并存入瓶中.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... homo- 表示“同类的” homogeneous 同类的；同族的 homosexual 同性恋的.
大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... hoist vt. 升起 homogeneous a. 同类的；均匀的 hop vi. 跳跃；单足跳 n.跳跃.
...（或划分）是相对的。换句话说，我们可以把心理看成是单一的、同质的、透明的和可渗透的东西。1.心理的“同质性”（homogeneity）是说，心理的各个部分都是单一的、均匀的，并无“质”上的不同，心理机制独立于它的内容，可以适用于多种目.
石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... homogen 均质 homogeneity 均匀性 homogeneization 均化作用.
奶均质化(Homogenization)是打断牛奶中的脂肪球，令其解散的一种制作法。虽然在乳制工业中属一种新的制作工艺，但均质化乳会 …

entry.def: Homogenized milk is milk where the fat has been broken up so that it is evenly distributed.

means.word_mean: 1. formed by blending unlike elements especially by reducing one element to particles and dispersing them throughout another substance

auth_sentence.content: It's to Mr. Blade's credit that he makes it all hold together—but not so relentlessly together that it sounds homogenized.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's to Mr. Blade's credit that he makes it all hold together—but not so relentlessly together that it sounds homogenized.

auth_sentence.content: In a world of increasingly homogenized museum collections, it's a tribute to the benefits of focused collecting.
